revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road |image = [[File:Victory Road.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Victory Road. |tokens = 2,000 |location = On Route 23. }} '''Victory Road''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 24,595 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix, [[File:Ninetales.png|40px]] Ninetales |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || [[File:Cooltrainer_(male).png|40px]] Cooltrainer Rolando || [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate, [[File:Ivysaur.png|40px]] Ivysaur, [[File:Wartortle.png|40px]] Wartortle,
[[File:Charmeleon.png|40px]] Charmeleon, [[File:Charizard.png|40px]] Charizard |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || [[File:Black_Belt (male).png|40px]] Black Belt Daisuke || [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machoke, [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop, [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machoke |- | [[File:Arbok.png|40px]] Arbok || [[File:Juggler.png|40px]] Juggler Nelson || [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee, [[File:Hypno.png|40px]] Hypno, [[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra,
